column3: Trends in tropical atmospheric temperature in the period 1979-1997
These are the plotted data in IPCC AR6 WG1 Chapter 3 Figure 3.10 panel b
Include radiosonde, reanalysis and CMIP6 data, including their uncertainty where available
Trends from RAOBCORE v1.7 (dotted line in figure)
Trends from RICH-obs v1.7 mean (dahsed line in figure)
Trends from the lower end of RICH-obs v1.5.1 ensemble range, recentered to v1.7 (grey shading in figure)
Trends from the upper end of RICH-obs v1.5.1 ensemble range, recentered to v1.7 (grey shading in figure)
Trends from ERA5/5.1 (solid line in figure)
Trends from CMIP6 coupled ocean models, multi-model mean (red squares in figure)
Trends from CMIP6 coupled ocean models, 5th percentile of multi-model ensemble (lower end of red range in figure)
Trends from CMIP6 coupled ocean models, 95th percentile of multi-model ensemble (upper end of red range in figure)
Trends from CMIP6 prescribed SSTs models, multi-model mean (blue squares in figure)
Trends from CMIP6 prescribed SSTs models, 5th percentile of multi-model ensemble (lower end of blue range in figure)
Trends from CMIP6 prescribed SSTs models, 95th percentile of multi-model ensemble (upper end of blue range in figure)
